awakeTimeRegistrationParameter.title: Awake time registration parameter
awakeTimeRegistrationParameter.description: in milliseconds, 0 means device is always online

enableResourceLevelTimestamp.title: Use common timestamp resources 5518 and 6050 or object specific timestamp for object 6 reported by the device if available

genericUIRetainOldValuesIfError.title: Keep old values in the objects tab if an operation fails
